body_html:
your error message:

win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_driver.cc:509] failed call to cuInit: CUDA_ERROR_NO_DEVICE

have you install CUDA® Toolkit 8.0 and cuDNN v5.1 ?

sess = tf.Session()
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:885] Found device 0 with properties:
name: GeForce GTX 850M
major: 5 minor: 0 memoryClockRate (GHz) 0.9015
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 2.00GiB
Free memory: 1.69GiB
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:906] DMA: 0
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:916] 0: Y
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:975] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX
850M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0)

your error message doesn't have this message

name: GeForce GTX 850M
major: 5 minor: 0 memoryClockRate (GHz) 0.9015
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 2.00GiB
Free memory: 1.69GiB

see here

body:
your error message:
> win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\stream_executor\cuda\cuda_driver.cc:509] failed call to cuInit: CUDA_ERROR_NO_DEVICE

have you install **CUDA® Toolkit 8.0** and **cuDNN v5.1** ?

>  sess = tf.Session()
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:885] Found device 0 with properties:
name: GeForce GTX 850M
major: 5 minor: 0 memoryClockRate (GHz) 0.9015
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 2.00GiB
Free memory: 1.69GiB
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:906] DMA: 0
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:916] 0:   Y
I c:\tf_jenkins\home\workspace\release-win\device\gpu\os\windows\tensorflow\core\common_runtim
e\gpu\gpu_device.cc:975] Creating TensorFlow device (/gpu:0) -> (device: 0, name: GeForce GTX
850M, pci bus id: 0000:01:00.0)

your error message doesn't have this message  

> name: GeForce GTX 850M
major: 5 minor: 0 memoryClockRate (GHz) 0.9015
pciBusID 0000:01:00.0
Total memory: 2.00GiB
Free memory: 1.69GiB

[see here](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_windows)
